name: God Complex
description:
7DFPS 2014 entry.

God Complex is a FPS where you play as a neutral third party in a red vs blue bot deathmatch. Your goal is to keep the game going as long as possible by possessing bots and influencing the outcome of the battle. The game ends when any team reaches a lead of 5 kills.

Made in Unreal Engine 4 (4.5.1)
